mapper.select: select tsc.sub_category_name, ttmi.table_meta_info_id, ttmi.table_id, ttmi.table_comment, ttmi.small_clsf_name from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id join tb_main_category tmc on ttmi.main_category_id = tmc.main_category_id join tb_sub_category tsc on ttmi.sub_category_id = tsc.sub_category_id where 1=1 and tsi.service_name = trim(#{serviceName}) and tmc.main_category_name = trim(#{mainCategoryName}) and tsc.sub_category_name = trim(#{subCategoryName});

select ttmi.table_id, ttmi.table_comment, ttmi.small_clsf_name, count(*) over () as total_num from tb_company_info join tb_service_info tsi on tb_company_info.company_id = tsi.company_id join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id where 1=1 and tsi.service_name = trim(#{serviceName})
and (ttmi.table_id ilike concat('%', trim(#{tableKeyword}), '%')
and (ttmi.table_comment like concat('%', trim(#{tableKeyword}), '%')
and ttmi.small_clsf_name like concat('%', trim(#{tableKeyword}), '%')
limit #{amountPerPage} offset (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{amountPerPage};

select ttmdi.table_col_id, ttmdi.table_col_datatype, ttmdi.table_col_comment from tb_table_meta_info ttmi inner join tb_table_meta_detail_info ttmdi on ttmi.table_meta_info_id = ttmdi.table_meta_info_id where ttmi.table_id = #{tableId};
